title: Blue Screen of Death when LoL goes in champion loading screen
body:
So basically for the last 2 months, I've been experiencing BSOD. I only get it when im in champion loading screen. It's so annoying because the game remakes, and it puts me on low priority queue. It usually happens every 1 or 2 days. I have tried to fix it by installing new drivers, checking updates and even manually reinstalling LoL.


Specs:

OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Home
System Model: HP 15 TouchSmart NoteBook PC
RAM: 6 GB
Intel Core i3-3120M CPU

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please upload your latest minidump file to a host of your choosing, these can be found at **C:\windows\minidump**

Apologies for such a late reply.
